about_the_game:
VAR Park Lifetime VIP is an exploratory decryption game that challenges you to solve the puzzles in this environment and escape the park. In the game you will be a tester identity, slowly discover the difference of this paradise, in the cycle of time, find the key back to real life. In this virtual VAR park, players can take various ways, such as riding and chopping, killing, find clues, trigger the mechanism, and finally find the secret of VAR park, so as to get different thoughts and feelings. In addition, players can experience interesting futuristic concept land.
The game features:
1. Engaging decryption sessions
The player will enter a time loop in the game, explore the environment, analyze clues and other means to solve the puzzle, when the truth is revealed, will get a surprising reversal.
2. Exquisite 3D effects
Cool 3D painting style, bring real picture performance, will bring you unforgettable visual experience.
3. A wide variety of game types
In the virtual VAR paradise, players can experience a variety of game types and feel full of experience.
